ARABIC: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: To whom does the earth belong, and everyone in it, if you have any knowledge?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "To whom does the earth and whosoever is upon it then belong, if you know?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Ask them: "Whose is the earth and those who are in it? Tell us if you know"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say to them, "Tell me, if you know, to whom does the earth and its contents belong?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “To Whom does the earth and all that is in it belong to, if you know?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Whose is the earth and whosoever is therein If you know!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Whose is the earth, and whoever is therein, if you know?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Whose is the earth, and whoso is in it, if you have knowledge?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Unto Whom (belongeth) the earth and whosoever is therein, if ye have knowledge?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "To whom do the earth and all therein belong? Tell me, if you have any knowledge?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: whose is the earth and whosoever is therein, if you know?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘To whom does the earth belong and whoever it contains, if you know?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "To whom belong the earth and all beings therein? (say) if ye know!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "Whose is the earth and whosoever is therein? If you know!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: "If you have knowledge, 'to whom belongs the earth' and, 'whoever is in it? '"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “To whom does the earth belong, and everyone in it, if you happen to know?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:84] Say, to them: ‘To whom does the earth and whoever is in it, of creatures, belong, if you [truly] knew?’, their Creator and Owner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad: (Unto Whom (belongeth) the earth and whosoever is therein) of created beings; answer me, (if ye have knowledge?)
